description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家语言文字工作委员会党组成员、纪检组长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, who served as a member of the Party Leadership Group and Discipline Inspection Team Leader of the State Language Work Committee.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work.

nodes.id: 国家语言文字工作委员会

zh-cn: 国家语言文字工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主管语言文字工作的机构，由教育部管理。
description.en: The language and character work agency of the People's Republic of China, administered by the Ministry of Education.

nodes.id: 全国语言文字工作会议

zh-cn: 全国语言文字工作会议
en: National Conference on Language and Script Work

description.zh-cn: 1986年举行的关于中国语言文字工作的全国性会议。
description.en: A national conference held in 1986 regarding China's language and script work.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 国家语言文字工作委员会

position.en: Member of the Party Leadership Group, Head of the Discipline Inspection Group

description.zh-cn: 陈乃华曾担任国家语委党组成员、纪检组长。
description.en: Chen Naihua served as a member of the Party Leadership Group and Head of the Discipline Inspection Group of the State Language Commission.

relationships.target: 全国语言文字工作会议

description.zh-cn: 陈乃华在1986年全国语言文字工作会议中担任副秘书长。
description.en: Chen Naihua served as the Deputy Secretary-General of the 1986 National Conference on Language and Script Work.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本和分类，陈乃华是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the text and categories, Chen Naihua is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.source: 国家语言文字工作委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 国家语言文字工作委员会由中华人民共和国教育部管理。
description.en: The State Language Commission is administered by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.
